title: Ben Affleck shows off buff physique as he picks up his children from school
text:
He packed on pounds of muscle in order to play Batman.

But even though he's hung up the cape for Robert Pattinson to take over the famous role, Ben Affleck has kept the physique, which he showed off on Friday afternoon.

Affleck, 47, wore a figure-hugging black sweatshirt to pick up his kids Samuel, 7, and Seraphina, 10, from their school in Santa Monica.

Dad duties: On Friday afternoon, Ben Affleck, 47, was spotted picking up his kids Samuel, 7, and Seraphina, 10, as his car was parked at a red curb in Santa Monica

The actor's mother, Christine Anne Boldt, was also in attendance for the afternoon pick-up.

She was seen carrying a book and a 3-tiered gift wrapped in wrapping paper and ribbon.

Affleck looked casual for the occasion in a black sweater and jeans.

He paired the look with blue trainers and aviator sunglasses as he helped his young ones into his Mercedes.

Good Grandma: The actor's mother, Christine Anne Boldt, was also in attendance for the afternoon pick-up

Thanks dad! Ben paired the look with blue trainers and aviator sunglasses as he helped his young ones into his Mercedes

Low key looks: Affleck looked casual for the occasion in a black sweater and jeans

The Gone Girl actor rocked a growing salt and pepper beard as he was later seen chatting on the phone.

Not pictured was Affleck's 13-year-old daughter, Violet.

Earlier in the day, the Good Will Hunting actor's ex-wife was spotted dropping off some supplies at Violet's school.

Garner looked overwhelmed but in good spirits for the chore.

She carried a large bucket full of autumn flowers as well as a science report on a large piece of cardboard without any help.

Garner and Affleck were married for 13 years.

They got divorced in 2018 and Garner is now dating businessman John Miller.

The 13 Going on 30 star is currently starring in and producing Yes Day as well as preparing for Fantasy Camp, a film about a teacher who pursues her Broadway dreams while attending a performing-arts camp for adults.

Star: The 13 Going on 30 star is currently starring in and producing Yes Day

Affleck made an appearance in the Jay and Silent Bob reboot that hit theaters for select viewings on October 15.

And on Thursday, it was reported that Affleck will star in the adaptation of Kate Southwood’s 2013 novel Falling to Earth.

Deadline reports that 'the book is based on the 1925 Tri-State Tornado, the deadliest tornado in U.S. history. Set in Marah, IL, the plot centers on Paul Graves (Affleck), who was the only person who didn’t lose everything on the day of the storm. His family, his home and his business remained intact. A year later, he’s faced with resentment and hostility from the locals as the small town resurrects itself from tragedy.'

The star also has a number of projects in pre- and post-production including historical drama The Way Back, war drama The Ghost Army and 14th Century flick The Last Duel.
description: Even though he's hung up the Batman cape for Robert Pattinson to take over the famous role, Ben Affleck has kept the superhero physique, which he showed off on Friday afternoon.
